Input: At Salem Academy, all students are expected to REACH for college, which means to act in a Responsible, Empathetic,
Assertive, Cooperative, and Honest manner. Being responsible students bring required materials to class each day. All
students are expected to maintain organized binders and use their planner daily to record homework. Students ars
expected to be prepared with these materials and a silent reading book at all times.
REOUIRED SUPPLIES: To be replenished throughout the year as needed.
• One 3" hardcover, three ring binder with outside plastic cover to insert schedule
• Four or Five 1" hardcover, three ring binder (Math, ELA, History, Science); five if taking Spanish
• One 1" hardcover, three ring binder for Service -Learning
• Three hole punched, wide ruled filler paper (8.5" by 11")
• One 12 pack of pencil top erasers or 1 large eraser
• One hand held pencil sharpener with removable top/cover for shavings
• 7 and Ste grade only: One Scientific calculator - e.g. Casio FX-300ES, Casio FX-300MS
Product: and Ste only One Scientific calculator
